class.name: MeshSimplificationSettings
class.brief_description: Parameters to be used with a [Mesh] simplification operation.
class.description: Parameters to be used with a [Mesh] simplification operation.

members.member: If [code]true[/code], use the sloppy simplification algorithm. The sloppy algorithm does not try to follow the topography of the original mesh.

How much the simplified mesh should be allowed to deviate from the source mesh normalized to 0..1 range. For example, a value of [code]0.01[/code] will try to maintain the error to be below 1% of the mesh extents.
Fraction of vertices that should be in the simplified mesh.
